short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your reading experience with Bionic Reading, now with Dark Mode

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bionic Reading Extension makes it easier for readers to glide through text quickly and stay focused. The first few letters are bolded - these artificial fixation points are supported by Gestalt psychology, where the mind seeks patterns and completeness in visual and cognitive stimuli.
